title: 5 Ways to Know if Your Friendships are Healthy or Toxic
description:
Have you ever felt tension in a friendship? How can you tell if it’s healthy or harmful? In this episode, Jordan dives into five, practical indicators to decipher if a friendship is healthy, what you can do if it’s not, and how to find the balance in those gray areas. 

@Jordanleedooley

@Shepodcast

Episode More Info: http://jordanleedooley.com/5-ways-to-know-if-your-friendships-are-healthy-or-toxic

Network Info: http://lastingmediagroup.com/she
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
